00014 /* ppmAttrTypes.h (do not include direction - include pph.h instead) */
00015 
00016 #ifndef PPM_PPM_ATTR_TYPES_H
00017 #define PPM_PPM_ATTR_TYPES_H
00018 
00019 
00020 typedef enum ppmBusPortTypeE {
00021     PPM_BUS_PORT_ILLEGAL,    // Do not use
00022     PPM_MASTER_PORT,
00023     PPM_SLAVE_PORT,
00024     PPM_MASTERSLAVE_PORT    // Not yet supported
00025 } ppmBusPortType;
00026 
00027 typedef enum ppmNetPortTypeE {
00028     PPM_NET_PORT_ILLEGAL,            // Do not use
00029     PPM_INPUT_PORT,
00030     PPM_OUTPUT_PORT,
00031     PPM_INOUT_PORT
00032 } ppmNetPortType;
00033 
00034 //
00035 // PPM bus port info.
00036 //
00037 typedef struct ppmBusPortS {
00038     Addr             addrHi;          // on slave port
00039 
00040     ppmString        name;
00041     ppmBusPortType   type;
00042 
00043     Uns32            addrBits;        // on master port
00044 
00045     // documentation
00046     ppmString        description;
00047     ppmPtr           descriptionDom;
00048 
00049     Bool             mustBeConnected;
00050     Bool             remappable;      // on slave port
00051 
00052 } ppmBusPort, *ppmBusPortP;
00053 
00054 
00055 //
00056 // PPM net port info.
00057 //
00058 typedef struct ppmNetPortS {
00059     ppmString        name;
00060     ppmNetPortType   type;
00061 
00062     // documentation
00063     ppmString        description;
00064     ppmPtr           descriptionDom;
00065     ppmHandlePtr     handlePtr;
00066     ppmNetFunc       netCB;            // call this to update a net
00067     Bool             mustBeConnected;
00068     ppmPtr           userData;
00069 
00070 } ppmNetPort, *ppmNetPortP;
00071 
00072 //
00073 // PPM net port  info.
00074 //
00075 typedef struct ppmPacketnetPortS {
00076     ppmString        name;
00077 
00078     // documentation
00079     ppmString             description;
00080     ppmPtr                descriptionDom;
00081     ppmPacketnetHandlePtr handlePtr;              // used to write to the packetnet
00082     ppmPtr                sharedData;             // pointer to shared data
00083     Uns32                 sharedDataBytes;        // number of bytes of shared data
00084     ppmPacketnetFunc      packetnetCB;            // call this to update a net
00085     Bool                  mustBeConnected;
00086     ppmPtr                userData;               // passed back to packetnetCB
00087 
00088 } ppmPacketnetPort, *ppmPacketnetPortP;
00089 
00090 typedef struct ppmVlnvInfoS {
00091     ppmString vendor;
00092     ppmString library;
00093     ppmString name;
00094     ppmString version;
00095 } ppmVlnvInfo, *ppmVlnvInfoP;
00096 
00097 
00098 //
00099 // Model parameter types
00100 //
00101 typedef enum ppmParameterTypeE {
00102     ppm_PT_BOOL,     // Boolean parameter. Can be 0,n,N,f,F,dis etc. or 1,y,Y,t,T,en
00103     ppm_PT_INT32,    // Signed integer parameter.
00104     ppm_PT_UNS32,    // Unsigned integer parameter.
00105     ppm_PT_UNS64,    // Unsigned long integer parameter.
00106     ppm_PT_DOUBLE,   // Floating point parameter.
00107     ppm_PT_STRING,   // String parameter.
00108     ppm_PT_ENUM,     // Enum parameter.
00109                      // Specified by a string from a set of strings.
00110                      // Returns an integer.
00111 } ppmParameterType;
00112 
00113 //
00114 // Enumeration name/value pairs
00115 //
00116 typedef struct ppmEnumParameterS {
00117     ppmString   name;
00118     ppmString   description;
00119     Uns32       value;
00120     ppmPtr      descriptionDom;
00121 } ppmEnumParameter;
00122 
00123 //
00124 // Specification of a model parameter
00125 //
00126 typedef struct ppmParameterS {
00127     ppmString        name;
00128     ppmParameterType type;
00129 
00130     // space for documentation
00131     ppmString        description;
00132     ppmPtr           descriptionDom;
00133 
00134     // specs of each parameter type
00135     union {
00136 
00137         struct ppmBoolParamS {
00138             Bool defaultValue;
00139         } boolParam;
00140 
00141         struct ppmInt32ParamS {
00142             Int32 defaultValue;
00143             Int32 min;
00144             Int32 max;
00145         } int32Param;
00146 
00147         struct ppmUns32ParamS {
00148             Uns32 defaultValue;
00149             Uns32 min;
00150             Uns32 max;
00151         } uns32Param;
00152 
00153         struct ppmUns64ParamS {
00154             Uns64 defaultValue;
00155             Uns64 min;
00156             Uns64 max;
00157         } uns64Param;
00158 
00159         struct ppmDoubleParamS {
00160             double defaultValue;
00161             double min;
00162             double max;
00163         } doubleParam;
00164 
00165         struct ppmStringParamS {
00166             ppmString defaultValue;
00167             Uns32     maxLength;    // zero means unlimited
00168         } stringParam;
00169 
00170         struct ppmEnumParamS {
00171             ppmEnumParameterP legalValues;    // Array of values, first is the default,
00172         } enumParam;
00173     } u;
00174     Bool mustBeSpecified;
00175 } ppmParameter, *ppmParameterP;
00176 
00177 #endif
